projects.title: CemSaver - Concrete Mix Optimizer
projects.description: ML model that optimizes concrete proportions. Consists of a neural net and a customizable objective function. The NN models the relation between concrete ingredient proportions and properties. The objective function is configured from a GUI to reflect the concrete technologists requirements. The concrete mix is then optimized by using the gradients of the ingredient proportions with regard to the objective function.

projects.title: Crowbar - Automated market maker w/ lending and leverage
projects.description: Protocol for guaranteeing collateral liquidity for volatile assets modifying the constant product market maker. Developed algorithms and datastructures for opening / closing positions, adjusting liquidity, liquidating positions, swaps, etc.. All algorithms had O(lgn) computational complexity and O(n) storage complexity (or better). Intended for low-cap volatile blockchain assets. Ultimately discontinued after considering economic ramifications; regulation of financial derivatives exist for a reason. Fun exercise in algorithm design though.

projects.title: Appevent
projects.description: WebApp for organizing and discovering events. Developed in a team of 6 students using Scrum for software development course TDT4140.

projects.title: Cookbook
projects.description: App for creating, sharing and discovering cooking recipes. Developed in team of 4 students using Scrum for software development course IT1901.

projects.title: MinGPT
projects.description: Followed Andrej Karpathy's course on building a generative pretrained transformer (GPT) from scratch. Learned how to implement core transformer components, such as self-attention, multi-head attention, feed-forward networks, positional encoding, and more.

projects.title: Sorting algorithm visualisations
projects.description: Built data structure visualisation library and implemented various sorting algorithms (including insertion-sort, quick-sort, merge-sort, heapsort). Done as exam preparation for algorithms and data structures course TDT4120.

projects.title: Neural Net Implementation
projects.description: Implemented neural network for MNIST dataset from scratch in Java. Derived and implemented backpropagation algorithm from scratch. Done as exam preparation for Java / Object Oriented Programming class TDT4140, and Linear Algebra class TMA4115.

projects.title: Ã†rlig - social app for compliments
projects.description: App to give anonymous compliments to friends. Intended to contribute positively to youths mental health. A reaction to existing social media's negative effects on youth.

projects.title: Lotus Turbo Challenge
projects.description: Recreated lotus turbo challenge racing game. Ray casting for rendering. Bezier curves for generating random infinite roads. Developed with two other students for a highschool IT class.

projects.title: Ray casting 3d engine
projects.description: Created rendering engine that simulates 3d using ray casting. From scratch, no libraries.

projects.title: Ray tracing 3d engine
projects.description: Developed a ray tracing engine in python. Allowed multiple light sources and various shapes. From scratch, no libraries (except displaying pixel data). Attached image has a high step length.

projects.title: N-body gravitational simulation
projects.description: Simulation of celestial bodies' paths in each other's gravitational fields. Used positions, velocity and mass, but not spin or volume. Used discrete steps. Done as a part of a larger project related to the N-body problem for a high school physics class.

projects.title: Bankbygget Sola Website
projects.description: Developed homepage for commercial building. Easy configuration of tenants and available spaces. Served as my introduction to web development.

projects.title: Colin Archer Sailing Website
projects.description: Developed homepage for sailing tour business. Converted to WordPress for easy configuration of text and gallery.

projects.title: Unity games
projects.description: Developed multiple 3d unity games. First game developed during programming summer camp.

projects.title: Minecraft Mod
projects.description: Developed a minecraft mod in connection with a Youth Digital course.
